title: Looking to add N172 (Old Judge) HOF to my collection

posts.post_title: Looking to add N172 (Old Judge) HOF to my collection
posts.post_content:
I've yet to enter the N162 collector's club and would love to add a HOFer (low grade) to my collection.

If anyone has dupes to sell, give me a ring! (PM)

Thanks

Jeff
